short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Homework Helper' helps with a variety of homework tasks; completing assignments and explaining concepts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Homework Helper uses chrome built-in AI to help with a variety of tasks, such as completing assignments, writing essays, and researching topics. It can also help brainstorm ideas, proofread work, and provide feedback. The audio can read out the text. Click once the audio will play and click again the audio button to stop speaking.
